H0.text: Which cricketer wrote the autobiographical 'Coming Back To Me'. Marcus Trescothick's teammate, Andrew Flintoff

H1.text: Which cricketer wrote the autobiographical 'Coming Back To Me'. Former English captain, Michael Vaughan

H2.text: Which cricketer wrote the autobiographical 'Coming Back To Me'. Australian cricketer, Shane Warne

H3.text: Which cricketer wrote the autobiographical 'Coming Back To Me'. Trescothick

A4.text: Trescothick released his autobiography, Coming Back to Me, on 9 September 2008

A5.text: In his autobiography, Coming Back to Me, Trescothick recalls that he was bigger than most of the other boys his age
